title: How to Access Your Inventory in GTA 5

steps.title: Press M if you're on a computer.
steps.content: Press M if you're on a computer. If you're using a computer, pressing the M key will open your interaction menu.

steps.title: Swipe the Touchpad (PS4) or press the Select button (PS3).
steps.content: Swipe the Touchpad (PS4) or press the Select button (PS3). You'll see either of these buttons or pads located in the center of your controller.

steps.title: Press the View button (Xbox One) or the Back button (Xbox 360).
steps.content: Press the View button (Xbox One) or the Back button (Xbox 360). You'll see either of these buttons located in the center of your controller. These will open the interaction menu. You can't access this via the Pause menu. Weapons that you can use from your inventory will automatically appear in your weapon wheel . [1] X Research source
